itemdescription_systemdata: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.
itemdescription_propertiespolicyassignme: The ID of the policy assignment that is being exempted.
itemdescription_propertiespolicydefiniti: The policy definition reference ID list when the associated policy assignment is an assignment of a policy set definition.
itemdescription_propertiesexemptioncateg: The policy exemption category. Possible values are Waiver and Mitigated.
itemdescription_propertiesexpireson: The expiration date and time (in UTC ISO 8601 format yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ) of the policy exemption.
itemdescription_propertiesdisplayname: The display name of the policy exemption.
itemdescription_propertiesdescription: The description of the policy exemption.
deleteResourceMessage: Do you want to delete resource?
